credit_line: Gift of Mel Byars, The Mel Byars Collection of 20th Century Design
title: "Oceana" line
description: (a) Oblong amoeba-shaped tray made of single slab of wood. Pierced oval handle slots at long ends. rounded smooth edges. Four circular depressions cut into upper surface to hold (b/e) four molded clear glass dishes, each of flat bottomed shallow cylindrical shape. Wood highly grained.
name: Tray and dishes
